channel.title: Allergies in the studio
channel.description:
There are many factors that may cause allergies in the studio:
1. **Contact dermatitus from your clay**
2. **Sensitivity to certain chemicals**
3. **Allergy to latex or the talcum powder used on surgical gloves**
4. **Mold & mildew growing in clay, water, masonite particle board, etc.**

item.title: Allergies in the studio
